# spantreeorbits

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of spantreeorbits is to use algebra to generate the orbits of the spanning trees of some polyhedra.

## Installation

You can install the development version of spantreeorbits like so:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JeffLansing/spantreeorbits")
```

## Example

A simple example is presented on the [Get Started](https://jefflansing.github.io/spantreeorbits/articles/spantreeorbits.html) page.
